info.title: XPR True Hole Conversion
info.description:
Use this API to convert any eligible holes in a single part or nest of parts into True Holes.

  API Steps:

    1. Upload part and settings files

    2. Convert

    3. Download converted file

[See workflow](/th-workflow)

200.description:
File uploaded successfully.

The response contains the unique file ID needed for the Convert step (such as *3e882a4259b44bb79a9ccdbbbea4bb9g*).

Copy this file ID for the Convert step.

parameters.name: apiConvertPostRequest
parameters.description: After clicking **Send**, the response will contain the True Hole File ID needed to download the converted file.

200.description:
File converted successfully.

The response contains the True Hole file ID needed for the Download step (such as *5e992a4259b11bb68a8ccdbbbea4bb9g*).

Copy this file ID for the Download step.
